name: Ampersand (itch)
description:
Prepare for a race through stunning tracks with Beautiful 3D visuals.

Pick your craft, each with different stats and abilities that will help you in different ways.

Open new tracks as you progress through the game, use skills to take down your opponents and finish the race in first place!

FUTURISTIC VEHICLES AND TRACKS

Fury Racing with awesome vehicles designed with unprecedented precision.

EXTREME RACING

Drive at high speed, grab power ups and drive with skill to come out top!

COMPETE YOUR FRIENDS

Gain trophies, beat highscores and duel friends using your Gamejolt Account.

Stable performance on nearly all devices - thanks to implemented awesome OCSR System and modern 3d engine.

High resolution screens support

Realistic 3d Physics and special effects !
